## Vector4.axisNZ() method

Creates a new Vector4 pointing in the negative direction of the Z axis, i.e. vec4(0, 0, -1, 0)

**Signature:**

```typescript
static axisNZ(): Vector4;
```
**Returns:**

[Vector4](doc/markdown/./base.vector4.md)

The new vector
